aboutUs: Fast Delivery, Scheduled Services, daily deliveries with predefined delivery address, pool delivery, different types of freight, frozen, construction materials, short and long distances, national and international services, etc.

howitworks: Quickly generate a shortlist of qualified experts in multiple disciplines from around the globe with our proprietary AI matching technology. With each shortlisted candidate, you'll be able to review detailed profiles, portfolios, and client reviews and ratings so you can find the perfect match for your project.
howitworksOne: Describe your project and Beecapp will connect you with top talent around the world, or near you.
howitworksTwo: Our AI matching technology generates a shortlist based on your project needs so you can hire with confidence.
howitworksThree: Receive invoices through Beecapp and easily pay for only the work you authorize.
